summary.purpose: Defines global enums and type aliases used across the server-commons library.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a single source of truth for SIM provider identifiers and service name types, preventing magic string usage.

exports.name: SimProvider
exports.description_one_line: Enum of SIM card provider identifiers used for SMS routing.

exports.name: NxServiceName
exports.description_one_line: Union type of all Nx microservice name strings.

exports.name: NxServiceNameMap
exports.description_one_line: Record mapping each NxServiceName to its base URL string.

symbols.name: SimProvider
symbols.description_one_line: Enum of SIM card provider identifiers used for SMS routing.

details.what_it_does: Defines the set of supported SIM providers: unknown, partner, pelephone, celcom, monogoto. Used by phone_number_helpers and notification_helpers to route SMS to the correct provider.

minimal_correct.title: Use SimProvider in a switch

symbols.name: NxServiceName
symbols.description_one_line: Union type of all Nx microservice name strings.

details.what_it_does: A string literal union type representing all known Nx microservice names (e.g., 'devices', 'users', 'notifications', etc.).

symbols.name: NxServiceNameMap
symbols.description_one_line: Record mapping each NxServiceName to its base URL string.

details.what_it_does: A Record<NxServiceName, string> type used by get_nx_service_urls to return environment-specific service URL maps.
